description: Try our easy to follow Garlicky Bean & Mixed Veg Roast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Garlicky Bean & Mixed Veg Roast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the soft garlic out of its skin onto the vegetables in the pan. Add the beans and vinegar and mix well. Return to the oven for a final 10 minutes. Sprinkle with the olives and serve with crusty bread.
